author: Anna Hecht
title: I've been self-quarantining in Sweden for 5 weeks — here's what it's been like
description: The Swedish government has not yet enforced a strict nationwide stay-at-home order as a result of Covid-19. I've been in Stockholm, Sweden, for the past five weeks in self-isolation. Here's what it's been like.
content:
It's been nearly five weeks since I first flew to Stockholm, Sweden, from New York City to visit my husband, who is a Swedish citizen, and celebrate my birthday.
What was initially supposed to be an eight-day trip quickly turned into a much longer one due to… [+4229 chars]
